Package org.dkr.graph.algo.centrality

package org.dkr.graph.algo.centrality
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BetweennessCentrality
    The Betweenness Centrality computes centrality values is the proportion of a vertex in all shortest paths.
    BetweennessCentrality.AddResultFiled
    Add a field to save the Betweenness Centrality value.
    BetweennessCentrality.APSPComputeFunction
    The compute function for All Pair Shortest Path.
    BetweennessCentrality.BetweennessComputeFunction
    Use the definition to compute the Betweenness Centrality value.
    BetweennessCentrality.GetResult
    Get the Betweenness Centrality value and ignore Intermediate values.
    BetweennessCentrality.InitVertices
     
    BetweennessCentrality.ShortestPathCounting
    Use some formulas to count the shortest path.
    ClosenessCentrality
    The Closeness Centrality computes centrality values by the mean value of the shortest path distances from every other vertices, which are obtained by AllPairShortestPath.
    ClosenessCentrality.APSPCombiner
     
    ClosenessCentrality.APSPComputeFunction
    The compute function for APSPComputation.
    ClosenessCentrality.InitVertices
     
    DegreeCentrality<K,​VV,​EV>
    The Degree Centrality computes centrality values by the mean value of degrees.
    DegreeCentrality.ComputeCentrality<VV>
    Then the degrees are divided by the number of vertices.
    DegreeCentrality.InitialMaximumDegree<VV>
    The Vertex Value is initialized as the number of vertices.
    PageRank<K>
    The PageRank algorithm compute pagerank values PR(i) for every vertex i.
    PageRank.InitialEdgeValue
    Each edge(u->v) has the weight 1 / Out(u).
    PageRank.InitialVertexValue<K>
    PR(i) are initialized as 1 / N.
    PageRank.PPRMessenger<K>
    Spread new PageRank Value.
    PageRank.PPRUpdater<K>
    Compute new PageRank Value.
    PersonalizedPageRank<K>
    The PersonalizedPageRank algorithm compute personalized pagerank values PR(s) for a source vertex s.
    PersonalizedPageRank.InitialEdgeValue
    Each edge(u->v) has the weight 1 / Out(u).
    PersonalizedPageRank.InitialPersonalizedVertexValue<K>
    PR(s) are initialized as 1.
    PersonalizedPageRank.PPRMessenger<K>
    Spread new PageRank Value.
    PersonalizedPageRank.PPRUpdater<K>
    Compute new PageRank Value.
